title: GENERAL
fullText:
Wiring systems includes the selection and installation of cables, wiring enclosures and enclosures containing conductor terminations. Wiring systems shall conform to the requirements of AS/NZS 3000, and the requirements of this document to maintain the integrity of the cable insulation and conductors and to reduce the risk of short circuit to a minimum.
Wiring of PV arrays shall be laid in such a way that the possibility of live-to-live and live-to-earth faults occurring is minimized.
